verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* heavens declare God’s glory, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* sky tells \w what|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* hands \w have|strong="H1732"\w* done.
Day \w tells|strong="H5046"\w* \w it|strong="H8064"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* day, night reveals \w it|strong="H8064"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* night,
\w without|strong="H3117"\w* speaking, \w without|strong="H3117"\w* words; \w without|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* sound \w of|strong="H3117"\w* voices.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* world \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* carries \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* earth. \w He|strong="H1697"\w* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* pitched \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w for|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* sun \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* sky,

\w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w comes|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bridegroom \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bridal chamber, \w it|strong="H7760"\w* joyfully runs \w its|strong="H3605"\w* course \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hero.

\w From|strong="H3318"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w end|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* heavens \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w rises|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* round \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w runs|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* other, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* nothing hides \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w its|strong="H3318"\w* heat. In Praise of the Law

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* law \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w is|strong="H4161"\w* perfect, renewing life. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* decrees \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* trusty, making \w the|strong="H5921"\w* simple wise.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* behests \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w*, rejoicing \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* command \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* pure, giving light \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w clean|strong="H1249"\w*, \w it|strong="H3068"\w* endures forever. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*’s judgments \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* altogether.

More precious \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w than|strong="H3068"\w* gold – \w than|strong="H3068"\w* fine gold \w in|strong="H3068"\w* plenty, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sweeter \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w than|strong="H3068"\w* honey, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* drops \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* comb.
\w By|strong="H2091"\w* them \w is|strong="H2091"\w* \w your|strong="H2530"\w* servant warned; \w who|strong="H7227"\w* keeps them \w has|strong="H2091"\w* rich reward.

\w Who|strong="H5650"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* know \w their|strong="H1571"\w* flaws? Absolve \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H5650"\w* \w those|strong="H6118"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* know \w not|strong="H1571"\w*.

Keep \w your|strong="H5641"\w* servant \w from|strong="H5352"\w* wilful sins – \w from|strong="H5352"\w* falling under \w their|strong="H5641"\w* sway: then \w blameless|strong="H5352"\w* \w and|strong="H5352"\w* \w clear|strong="H5352"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* I be \w from|strong="H5352"\w* great offence.

\w May|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* words \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* mouth \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* thoughts \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* heart \w be|strong="H1571"\w* pleasing \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H1571"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w my|strong="H5650"\w* rock \w and|strong="H5650"\w* redeemer.
